page.title: 19Clubs in Braintree.
page.content: There are many associations and clubs present in{Braintree and Rayne.} These permit a wide variety of activities which can be enjoyed by all members of the population. The youth movements are flourishing with Scouting and Guiding, and the church brigades having many new members. There are also facilities for the enjoyment of all forms of sports and leisure activities. There are groups which gather together for musical events, choral work and acting. These people use the various halls and community centres in the area for their events. From a survey of tne local area we found that people in general joined together roughly once or twice per week. The young people are generally well catered for with many schools running clubs as extra activities.
